description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.), All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2024-08-14 at 2 p.m. EST. All bids submitted after 2 p.m. EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This solicitation is for the procurement of (qty 7) 16 feet aluminum Jon Boat to be delivered to Prescott, ON. This requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods. International trade agreements do not apply. The lowest price, technically compliant proposal will be recommended for award. Mandatory delivery on or before March 25, 2025.

full_summary:
# 16 feet Aluminum Jon Boat Tender
=====================================

### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4686111211
* Publication Date: July 17, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: August 14, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

### Amendment Details

* Amendment Number: 1
* Amendment Date: July 18, 2024

### Contract Overview

This solicitation is for the procurement of seven (7) 16 feet aluminum Jon Boats for delivery to Prescott, ON. The bid seeks a vendor who can provide a compliant and compliant solution within the specified deadline. The lowest price bids will be evaluated first, and the contract will be awarded to the vendor with the lowest total bid.

### Key Requirements

* Delivery: Mandatory before March 25, 2025
* Spare Parts: Will be required to be included with the delivery
* Shipping: Must be arranged by the bidder
* Warranties: Must be included in the bid proposal
* Canadian Goods: A preference will be given to Canadian bidders
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies

### End User Information
The 16 feet aluminum Jon Boat will be used by the Department of fisheries and Oceans (DFO) in the region of Prescott.

### Contact Information

For more information on this tender, please contact:
Dominic Marois, Procurement Specialist
Email: dominic.marois@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: Not Available
Meeting/Contact: Not Available

### Notice URL

The full Notice of Intent to Proceed can be found on the Ariba Discovery website: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20340195?extsite=MjAzNDAxOTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Evaluation Criteria

The bids will be evaluated based on the specifications and requirements outlined in this document. The lowest-priced bid will be recommended for contract award.
